parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of faces on the body (see Remarks )

title: IBody2.IGetFaces
description: Gets all of the faces on the body.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of faces on the body (see Remarks )

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of faces on the body VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IBody2::GetFaceCount
to get the value of Count.
